title: Platinum Pickaxe
summaries: The Platinum Pickaxe is an early-game pickaxe. Its alternate ore counterpart is the Gold Pickaxe.

The Platinum Pickaxe is able to mine <linked>blocks</linked> and ores weaker than <linked>Ebonstone</linked>, <linked>Crimstone</linked>, <linked>Hellstone</linked>, and <linked>Pearlstone</linked> (which requires a pickaxe with at least 65% pickaxe power, e.g. a <linked>Nightmare Pickaxe</linked>). Most notably, it can mine <linked>Meteorite</linked>.
(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) The Platinum Pickaxe can also mine Obsidian.
Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legendary for combat purposes.
